content.html: I see folks making fun of the CVE issued for the default password on Raspberry Pi I personally want to see CVEs for EVERY _static_ default credential. I want it to show up in searches for the vendor name or product, CVE counts for a vendor, and in risk ratings for the product.
content.value:
I see folks making fun of the CVE issued for the default password on Raspberry Pi

I personally want to see CVEs for EVERY _static_ default credential. I want it to show up in searches for the vendor name or product, CVE counts for a vendor, and in risk ratings for the product.
